Title(s): ‘þe amendis to þe telyouris and sowtaris for the turnament maid on thame’
_description: William Dunbar, ‘þe amendis to þe telyouris and sowtaris for the turnament maid on thame’ — ten quatrains with refrain, ‘Teȝouris and sowtaris blist be ȝe’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
BEtwix tuelfe houris and ellevinI dremit ane angell come frome
                    hewin…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Thocht ȝe be knaifis in þis cwntreTailȝouris
                    and Sowtaris blist be ȝe
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author:
Quod Dumbar quhone he drank to þe Dekynnis ffor amendis to þe
                    bodeis of þair craftis (p. 317)
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.378-9.

Banna.First Lines:
Betuix twell houris and ellevinI dremed ane angell came fra
                    hevin…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Thocht ȝe be knavis in this cuntreTelȝouris and
                    sowtaris blist be ȝie
